__e: Why, it shouldn't take me more than an hour to meet a couple of dozen of them.
Down i goes, and there's a dozen of them. Dozen who?
You can buy a dozen just like it for a dollar apiece.
Look, I've told you a dozen times, you don't mean a thing in my life.
I use it all day everyday, at least a half dozen times a day, no matter where I am. It is actually the first thing I look at in the morning and the last thing I do before I sleep.
I've already told you a dozen times he'll be back tonight.
Some days, you see no more than half a dozen people.
I say I want nobody working for this guy, and he's got a dozen people living here!
Less than a dozen people know where it is... and even fewer know how to unleash what lies there.
I use it all day everyday, at least a half dozen times a day, no matter where I am. It is actually the first thing I look at in the morning and the last thing I do before I sleep.
I say I want nobody working for this guy, and he's got a dozen people living here!
